channel.title: Markdown on Automate everything
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Automate everything

item.title: Create a Static Web Page With Github Pages and Hugo
item.description: You can use GitHub Pages to host a website about yourself, your organization, or your project directly from a repository on GitHub.com. Hugo takes Markdown, runs them through a theme template, and spits out HTML files that you can easily deploy online â€“ extremely fast.

item.title: Basic Markdown Syntax
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
